channel.title: EKS on Terraform Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in EKS on Terraform Workshop

item.title: result
item.description: Terraform 명령으로 생성 합니다. terraform init terraform plan terraform apply 다음과 같은 메세지가 출력 되면 성공 입니다. Apply complete! Resources: x added, 0 changed, 0 destroyed. Outputs: config = # # kube config aws eks update-kubeconfig --name workshop-eks --alias workshop-eks # or mkdir -p ~/.kube && cp .output/kube_config.yaml ~/.kube/config # files cat .output/aws_auth.yaml cat .output/kube_config.yaml # get kubectl get node -o wide kubectl get all --all-namespaces # endpoint = https://F4CB6XXXXXXXXX53EXXXXXXXXXX5BA2.sk1.ap-northeast-2.eks.amazonaws.com name = workshop-eks kubectl 실행을 위한 권한을 획득합니다.
